dental-insurance.dental-insurance-indicate-status: Indicate if you have access to private dental insurance.

submit.you-are-submitting: You are submitting an application for the following people:
submit.please-review: Please review your application to make sure all the information is correct.
submit.by-submitting: By submitting the application, you're confirming that all information you've shared is correct. This information will be verified against your Social insurance Number (SIN) and Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) records. If any information provided is incorrect, you could lose your coverage.
submit.review-eligibility-criteria: Please review the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) <eligibilityLink>eligibility criteria</eligibilityLink> and confirm that you meet all requirements. If you are found to be ineligible for the CDCP at any time during the benefit year, you may need to repay the full costs of dental care you received under the plan.
submit.info-is-correct: I confirm that all the information provided in the application is correct, and understand that it will be verified against my tax information.
submit.i-understand: I understand the CDCP eligibility criteria, and I acknowledge that if I am found to be ineligible at any point during the benefit year, based on incorrect information I provided, I will need to repay the cost of any dental care received under the plan.

error-message.acknowledge-info-required: You must confirm that all information provided is correct to proceed
error-message.acknowledge-criteria-required: You must confirm that you understand the eligibility criteria to proceed

confirm.make-note: Save this code, you'll need it to check the status of your application.
confirm.keep-copy: Print or save a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-important: It is important to keep a copy of your application.
confirm.whats-next: You will receive a letter confirming eligibility
confirm.begin-process: We have received your application. You will be sent a letter within 30 business days to let you know if you are eligible for the plan.
confirm.check-status: Check the status of your application
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your application.
confirm.use-code: You will need your application code or member ID.
confirm.get-updates-text: <mscaLinkAccount>My Service Canada Account (MSCA)</mscaLinkAccount> is the fastest way to receive important information about the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm.get-updates-info: Once your application is processed, you can sign into MSCA to:
confirm.update: Update your contact information and communication preferences
confirm.how-insurance: How do I use my Canadian Dental Care Plan benefits
confirm.eligible-text: If deemed eligible we'll share your information with Sun Life. Sun Life will send you a welcome package by mail. This welcome package will include your member card and information about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, including your coverage start date.
confirm.more-info-cdcp: The Canadian Dental Care Plan will help pay for a portion of the cost for a wide range of oral health services, but may not pay the full amount. Before receiving oral health care, you should also ask your oral health provider about any costs that won't be covered by the plan.
confirm.more-info-service: For more information about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, visit <dentalContactUsLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan - Canada.ca</dentalContactUsLink>.
confirm.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
confirm.previously-enrolled-title: Previously enrolled in Canadian Dental Care Plan
confirm.consent-answer: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.preferred-notification-method-msca: Digitally through My Service Canada Account (MSCA)
confirm.dental-private: Access to private dental insurance or coverage

modal.info: By closing the application, you will end your session and any information entered will be cleared from your browser. Make sure you printed or save a copy of your application code.
modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to close the application?

survey.title: Give us feedback on your application experience
survey.info: You can help us improve the Canada Dental Care Plan with a short survey. This will take just 3 to 5 minutes of your time. The survey will open in a new window.

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and the information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.
